title: "ConvertPDF"
output: html_document

## Import packages

```{r cars}
library(pdftools)
library(ReporteRsjars)
library(ReporteRs)
```

## Read PDF file in Text format

```{r , echo=FALSE}
## change current working directory

setwd('C:/Users/dbsnail/Projects/readPDFtext')

## read PDF file
cons <- pdf_text("constitution.pdf")
## check content
cat(cons[1])
```

## Save text content in word format

```{r}
doc<-docx()
doc.filename <- "constitution.docx"
doc <- addParagraph(doc, cons)
writeDoc(doc,file=doc.filename)
```

## Save text content in text format

```{r}
fileConn <- file("constitution.txt")
writeLines(cons, fileConn)
```
